description:
The following list represents possible vacant positions within state agencies.  Due to changes in our workforce, challenges with up-to-date reporting and other factors, this list may not represent all of the vacancies or may list positions that have been filled since this data was collected.  There may be additional vacancies in the Department of Transportation, Department of Conservation, Department of Elementary and Secondary Education, Department of Agriculture, Department of Economic Development, Department of Health and Senior Services and the Department of Public Safety that are not represented here.
(03/27/2015)

name: COMBINED VACANT ALLOCATED POSITIONS
